titleStmt.title: De cursione lune Here begynneth the course and disposicion of the dayes of the moone in laten and in Englysshe whiche be good: and whiche be badde after the influentes of the moone drawen out of a boke of Aristotiles de astronomiis.
Meteorologica. English
titleStmt.author: Aristotle.

publicationStmt.publisher: R. Faques] And be for to sell [by R. Wyer] in saynt Martyns parysshe at the sygne of Saynt Joh[a]n Euangelyst,

notesStmt.note: A translation, in verse, of: Aristotle. Meteorologica.
Imprint from colophon; printer's and bookseller's names and publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: saynt Martyns parysshe at the sygne of Saynt Joh[a]n Euangelyst
